text: Richard Beard (fl. 1540) was a sixteenth-century English courtier. Beard was a member of the Privy Chamber of Henry VIII of England. He was one of the envoys, along with Nicholas Wotton, who was involved in negotiating a marriage between his monarch and his fourth wife, Anne of Cleves.p.619, David Starkey, Six Queens ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:16th-century English diplomats Category:English courtiers
